browserActionTitle.description: [Don't Translate] The title of the browser action button

appDescription.message: A browser extension that enables you to assign tags to players on lichess.org.

tagSetEnabledDescription.message: Enable / disable this set. Once disabled the tags associated with this set will no longer be displayed.

settingLitagsEnabledDescription.message: Use the switch to enable / disable Litags.

deleteUserConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete user %s?
deleteUserConfirm.description: %s is a placeholder for the username of the to be deleted user.

deleteTagConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete tag %s?
deleteTagConfirm.description: %s is a placeholder for the tag name of the to be deleted tag.

importConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to import this file? Importing will overwrite all existing data of the entries you have selected.

exportNoneSelectedError.message: Choose at least one entity to export.

importNoneSelectedError.message: Choose at least one entity to import.
